MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G52 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am to safely progress the underground cable fault at Tweedsmuir Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.21am on Tuesday 23rd February 2021.
